definition: to fast/to abstain from eating/to forbid the eating of (certain foods)/a fast

sentences.english: In this month, Muslims from all around the world fast in the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 在这个月里，世界各地的穆斯林在白天都要禁食。

sentences.english: They proclaimed a fast, and set Naboth on high among the people.
sentences.chinese: 宣告禁食，叫拿伯坐在民间的高位上。

sentences.english: Jesus was tempted during His 40-day fast in the wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣在旷野里禁食40天，所受诱惑颇多。

sentences.english: Some fasted, though others ate nachos.
sentences.chinese: 他们要么只吃了玉米片，要么完全禁食。

sentences.english: Is it such a fast that I have chosen?
sentences.chinese: 这样禁食，岂是我所拣选使人刻苦己心的日子吗。

sentences.english: Meditating without food does not prove that he is reincarnation of Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 能冥想而不禁食不能证明他是达摩转世。

sentences.english: I humbled my soul with fasting; and my prayer returned into mine own bosom.
sentences.chinese: 我借着禁食，谦卑己心，我所求的都归到自己的怀中。

sentences.english: Since those pigeons always followed their leader's orders, they fasted willingly.
sentences.chinese: 五百只鸟向来都是听从鸟王的命令，果真乖乖地禁食。

sentences.english: which departed not from the temple, but served God with fastings and prayers night and day" (Luke 2:36-37)
sentences.chinese: 并不离开圣殿，禁食祈求，昼夜事奉神。

sentences.english: I fast twice a week, I give tithes of all that I get.
sentences.chinese: 我每周两次禁食，凡我所得的，都捐献十分之一。

sentences.english: Fasts with urine and water are practised for one or more days.
sentences.chinese: 用尿和水禁食实践一天或更多天。

sentences.english: The Bible writes that Moses and Jesus fasted for 40 days for spiritual renewal.
sentences.chinese: 在圣经中也提到摩西和耶和华禁食40天以获得新生。

sentences.english: Today is a popular god day, barriss to fasting day.
sentences.chinese: 今天是象头神节，芭丽要禁食一天。

sentences.english: And they took their bones, and buried them under a tree at Jabesh, and fasted seven days.
sentences.chinese: 将他们骸骨葬在雅比的垂丝柳树下，就禁食七日。

sentences.english: Compared with males, the effect of CF was more pronounced in female fasters.
sentences.chinese: 与男性相比，女性禁食者表现得更为明显。

sentences.english: Fasting blood samples were taken to assess plasma concentrations of lutein and zeaxanthin .
sentences.chinese: 采集禁食血样以评定血浆中叶黄素和玉米黄质的浓度。

definition: abstain from certain food (as when ill)/avoid certain foods/be on a diet
(of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
to give up drinking/to abstain from drinking
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
